评论概述: It's not just clothing, It's a great investment.
评论详情: I love these bibs! They fit where they need to and they are durable with out being stiff. Pockets for all of my tools when I'm working and no need for a purse in public! I will be buying more!  ** try them on before washing and READ the instructions for washing**  I say that because I did NOT do this when I bought Dovetails jeans. The jeans were a little tight but I washed them anyway planning to keep them, I ended up shrinking them. I learned 2 things with these bibs: 1. This brand is made for function and comfort not style, so go up in size. I'm a size 8 in most women's jeans, with this brand I wear a 12 and I would rather wear bibs everyday now. 2. Low heat or hang drying will make a huge difference in durability.  If you're still reading and on the fence... I have done a lot of odd jobs over the years. I wore these bibs 3 days straight after a flood hit my neighbors house and I had a zero problems gutting the house with these on. - Sheet rock dust and putty came right off, -Knee pads fit well, -Tools fit in every pocket and stayed, no tears, no wear, no fading, no fraying. - No shoulder pain from the suspenders when I bent down and no ride ups. I would have ripped my regular jeans, wore out the knee, had dust caked to me and been pulling up my pants every 20 seconds... Its worth every penny.

I'm 5'6 and 150#. I usually wear a size 8 and I don't like pants that hit at my ankles so I ordered an 8 Long. The length was Perfect!! The size 8 was just a little too snug for my taste, especially around the waist and hips. Here's what I thought was great: the pockets! And the material was heavier duty- not some thin flimsy fabric that would tear easily. Another win- it stretches when you bend and squat! Now to wait for a 10 Long to be in stock.... But then I'm definitely ordering them!

Initially impressed because the fit is great. However, a brief grazing with a ladder at work chafed/ripped right in the seat. If you're expecting truly heavy canvas these aren't it. I'm an aircraft mechanic-- can we please get some old-school material that actually lasts?? I'd try for the limited warranty but those have pretty bad feedback as well. I hope dovetail makes some improvements because for the price I'd expect more than disposable clothes.

I adore these so much. Ordered a second pair after wearing them for one day. Super comfortable, awesome and protective for working, durable thick material, and actually flattering too.  My only complaint is that there are no loops to hang things from. I use my belt loop for my keys, and hate having to put them in my pocket, so will probably add one myself.
Very comfortable!  Initially the straps are a bit of a pain, but break in with wear. I bought a second pair.

Super cute, I get compliments every time I wear them. I love them for gardening and outside chores. They stretch and have plenty of useful pockets. Well made and sturdy. Because I get so many compliments I’ve ended up wearing them out to run errands and meet friends as well.
Not that soft but the fit is amazing. Very flattering to your figure. I wish I could’ve afforded to keep them!

评论概述: Came with a big stain on them.
评论详情: Fit pretty well, comfortable but came with a big stain on them and then it took forever to get a refund.
Nice looking and very comfortable overalls, fit is great.

I purchased these after reading so much about how these are supposed to be the best in women’s workwear. I have consistently been wearing carhartt for the last 10+ years and haven’t really had too many complaints other than variety. Upon trying these on I found that the only thing that was great about them was the length of the legs and the thickness. I ordered a size 2 extra long which is a small in the women’s carhartt bibs and what the size chart chart suggested. For an extra long they still went up my butt, the legs were long but the torso was not. The top part of the bibs was like a thong for my boobs. It was almost half the width of my carhartt bibs, and I do not have big boobs I’m a 36 C so when I would try to bend over it would cover one boob, or be in between my boobs. The pockets on the back were super high up and looked weird. These were too tight so when I decided to return them and size up I noticed that when you go from size 2 to size 4 the price increases drastically. I just ended up sending them back and will prefer a new pair of carhartt bibs. Super disappointing as I was looking forward to these because of all the hype they were getting. For reference I’m 5’8 and 140 lbs. so not even super tall.

OMG!! ABSOLUTELY WHAT I WANTED... these overalls are just what I needed in my life. I was fed up with ruining my regular clothes doing DIY projects with cement and wood (which I seem to be doing a lot lately) so I decided to purchase a pair of overalls. I tried them on a soon as I received them and I simply LOVE them and all of the pockets!! They are super comfy and stretchy and contour to my body without fitting tight or baggy while still feeling feminine in them. I actually feel strangely sexy in them too...haha!  The material is premium quality, for sure! I bended, squatted, and twisted every which way possible with easy and comfort.  They were delivered just in time my next project, 2 days early, even.  I'll be breaking them in and putting them to the real test tomorrow.  I'm sure I'll be buying anther pair for the warmer months. I most definitely recommend!

The fit of these is very uncomfortable. I wish I wore them around doing work like activities without doing anything that could get them dirty (ie painting) that wouldn’t allow for me to return them.  They are extremely tight in the hips and limit movement but when I went a size up the top was super super loose and just got in the way. I wear DDD bra too so I can’t imagine how loose it is on people with a smaller chest.  I usually wear a size 27 jeans and got the 4/30 on these. I do workout and have somewhat of a booty (I know you can’t tell from these photos bc the overalls are squeezing too tight). And it also is very tight on the tummy giving the illusion of a FUPA. It’s just disappointing because these are really expensive.  There is also no utility loop for a hammer but there are lots (somewhat too many) of pockets.  I tried to like them and give money to small business but I’m very disappointed and going to have to get a pair of carhartts.
Love the quality of the fabric. Well made. The material is fairly heavy so a bit warm in 90 degree weather
Got so many compliments. Cute, functional and warm!

I like everting about these woman’s overalls, as well as supporting this woman owned/women run company for women I buy my overalls directly from them, but they didn’t have white. I was happily surprised to find them here.

I wanted overalls without such a boxy baggy fit, and these were perfect. They are work attire so they do have some extra pockets and compartments (a little loop whole built for clippers or gardening scissors or something), so they may be a different style than some people are looking for, but I love the length and the fit. They are a little bit stretchy but rather form fitting for overalls. They feel like they will last forever, and they look great. I've never felt so cute and comfy in a pair of overalls, honestly.
An Overall that flatters a woman’s body are hard to find.  These ARE THE ONES YOU'VE BEEN LOOKING FOR stretchy flattering dress up or down feel sexy and strong in these soft stretchy jeans.
Made for women who work. They are comfortable and durable. I felt safe cutting out the underbrush and hailing trees. Also super cute.
I love the fit & all the pockets but the material is sooo thick & coarse

评论概述: Bottom very comfortable, but strap hardware fell out and buckles ride on shoulders
评论详情: The first time I put these on, the rivet for one of the shoulder straps popped out.  I put it back it.  After a few wears however, it fell out.  The pants part are super comfortable.  On me, the shoulder buckle sits on my collarbone/shoulder bone - not very comfortable.  A bit shorter strap would work for more people. I wanted to love these.

评论概述: If you have large legs these might not work
评论详情: I have large calves after going way up in size the leg was still to small. Really unfortunate because they're cute.
I opened the package and had a strong whiff of laundry detergent. Overalls came washed with perfumed laundry smell and no tag!

评论概述: What trades are these women actually in?
评论详情: These lasted for maybe 2 months of continued use. I’ve worn them almost everyday for the few weeks and got out of my truck and the strap button ripped off. The quality and fit is astounding when you first get their items..and they only last for 3-4 months. They charge twice as much than other brands, because we don’t have good options as women. I’m still waiting on word from the other pair of overalls I bought from them that are already past its prime after 2 washes. It’s so very disappointing; like being in a man dominated field isn’t tough enough sometimes, we can’t even have clothes that last?!

Absolutely not worth $120. In the first day one of the side snaps broke. The next day one of the buckles for the straps wouldn't hold and kept coming undone. Then another snap broke on the other side. I wear these for work. I'm a welder. I get dirty and am rough on my clothes. I wanted something that lasts. Not going to buy again.

I am a TK teacher. I found that I was wearing out the knees in the pants I was wearing to work. Dovetail has the added material I need to crawl around on the floor with my students. I now own 4 pair of dovetail overalls and a pair of their work pants. I am known on campus as the teacher who wears overalls daily. The padded knees, multiple pockets and comfort allows me to sit comfortably in the sandbox, crawl around the floor to build towers with my students, do messy crafts and enjoy being with my kids without worrying about ruining my wardrobe. I suggest that you size down. I normally wear a 6; however, surprisingly I have a pair in size 2 that fit me, but size 4 fits me best. I highly recommend these overalls and pants without hesitation.

I ordered 8/28 and they were too short. So rather than the hassle of returning them, I gifted them to someone shorter than myself. I ordered another pair in 8/30, and they don't seem any longer. I'm now out $200 dollars on two pair of these as the new ones that claimed to be longer definitely are not. It's unfortunate because I like everything else about the fit. Not risking ordering a third pair and having them be the same length once again. Super disappointed.

I'm 5'5", 135lb and normally a size 2. I ordered a 4/30 after reading other reviews. They were very tight in the hips/butt/thighs, though they fit nicely from the waist up. Then I ordered the 6/30, which fit better on the bottom but was very baggy from the waist up. They are well sewn and feel like quality material, the abundance of pockets is very nice. Unfortunately neither size was flattering, so  I'm returning them both. I also prefer a tapered jean and thought the leg was more like a flare.
These are great! Love the stretchy straps and fit design! Fit perfect and have lots of little nooks and crannies! Gonna get another pair in another color!

I have NEVER had overalls fit like these. They are UNBELIEVABLY comfortable, and they are made for tough work. They have a a wonderful stretch to them, and have so many pockets for tools. I will be buying so many more! I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THEM!!!

评论概述: Love the Wabash Stripe better than the Indigo Stripe
评论详情: So, I found the Wabash Stripe to be a slimmer fit with much thicker material-also it had a hook for a hammer and reinforced heels in the back of pant. The Indigo Stripe did not have these.  I weigh 169lbs, am 5'5.5" tall, apple shaped, and got a size 10/32 or 10 Long in the Wabash Stripe. The 4 photos show Wabash Stripe (darker blue stripe) & 4 show the Indigo Stripe (lighter colored). I would suggest going with the wabash.

I’m 5’5” and 130 lbs. I bought a size 2. The bibs fit great, only a little tight around the hips/butt. I prefer work pants a little tighter though, so I don’t catch on things. Size up if you like a little extra room. The bibs are very stretchy and not restrictive. Squatting and moving around in small spaces is no problem at all

These are the cutest overalls. I get compliments every time I wear them. They are super stretchy and not constructive at all. They are very thick nice material that is soft and not rough on the skin. Pair them with doc Martin's and a flannel. Cozy cute outfit.

评论概述: Work clothes for petite women, finally!
评论详情: They are wonderful, I have the grey canvas & they do run on the small side. Worked out well for me, but just be aware. So many pockets & nice material for working.

类型: Size: 2 Extra LongColor: Heathered Black Denim
评论详情: Love the range in inseam choices. I'm tall and have trouble finding pants and especially overalls that are long enough. These fit perfectly and I love the color and all the pockets!

The hips are narrow & the gut is huge. I tried a 4 & a 6, in both sizes, the hips were tight & narrow & the bib balloons out with no waist shaping. The fake fly is a huge disappointment, the double needle crossed over itself is a sign of cheap assembly. The hardware is also extremely flimsy & cheap. The fabric seems a little cheap & thin for the price of "quality workwear". I love the pockets, & I could maybe forgive the flaws because the pockets are so good, but there is no way these would ever fit. If you're narrow hipped & have a baby bump, gut distention, or really bad posture, these might be your new favorites.

These overalls looked so nice and the material was soft yet felt durable. However, I ordered my regular size and one size up after reading other comments about these running small. Neither of them fit. They were too small. So I’m retuning both. Not paying $100 when they can’t get the sizing right.

评论概述: Took a month to get item
评论详情: Item is great! Took a month to receive item
Perfect fit! Durable! Quality! Plenty of pockets!

Amazing, thank you Dovetail. Hopefully they do a line expansion & build on this model. The bib moves with your body but is fitting enough to be cute. I love the stretchy, yet supportive suspenders that move with the entire function of the set. Size up if you plan for long johns. The pockets are very functional. Great buy and durable..maybe buy 2 for fair rotation.

I was excited to buy these since a lot of leading female farmers wear them but day one of wearing them in the field… the left button popped. So the Clip was left hanging with half my chest exposed. SMH this product is too expensive for to break on Day one.

评论概述: These fit like a glove and that never happens!
评论详情: I love eveything about Dovetail. They have 8 long!!!! A bunch of pockets because women use pockets don't ya know. I have received CARGO PANTS WITH FAKE POCKETS so thought I would mention the pockets and they have a nice stretch plus they look AWESOME.

评论概述: I'm in love with these overalls!!
评论详情: I absolutely love these overalls! This is the very first pair of overalls that fit my small strong body well. I'm a painter and have always been looking for a good pair that were long enough and fit my butt. I found them! True to size for me. I bought these to paint in them, and after trying them on I may need a second pair so I can keep one pair clean. There are not many well fitting womans work clothes. I have been using tactical pants for years and I'm just so happy to have discovered dovetail. ☺️
Love my Dovetail overalls..nice tapered fit...

评论概述: Correct sizing- love them for lighter duty.
评论详情: Got mine today. I’ve been hot for Duluth lately and saw the flouret recommendation and decided to give them a shot. Compared to Duluth these are definitely easier wearing. Thinner and they fit closer to the body. They have more stretch- or I should say they have stretch. They aren’t the classic workwear duck material. I’ll likely wear these in public more then my Duluths. For really nasty chores and winter work it’s still my duluth firehose overalls. These are really nice and comfortable though and will wear them all the time for lighter duty stuff. Love them. Also women owned and made for women. Love the diversity of their models. Love the brand and support them.

I work on a farm and I absolutely love these. They are flexible and move with me as I’m bending, stretching and lifting. They look great on and have plenty of places to tuck my towels or anything else when I need both hands.

评论概述: Seem to run small for overalls?
评论详情: On the hunt for the perfect painters bib, I think I’ve tried on every brand of white overalls that’s available in a women’s cut. I was excited to try these since I’ve heard so many good things about Dovetail. I’m 5’8” with a long torso, 155lb with most of that weight in my hips. I originally ordered a size 10 and it was uncomfortably  fitted. Then I ordered a 12 which honestly doesn’t feel a whole lot different. I actually had to use a measuring tape to confirm they were  different sizes. The 12 gives me a *little* more room in the hips. I can squat down without too much restriction. But they’re still really fitted, and I’m not sure how I feel about it.  There’s definitely not enough room to wear leggings underneath. The 12 gives me PLENTY of length in the straps, though… I have to shorten them significantly. Unfortunately the 14 is not currently not available.It’s a weird conundrum, I assumed this brand would have a more generous cut in the hip/butt area. The quality seems great and I love the zip pocket on the leg. But I’m not sure these are the ones for me.

When I first learned about white overalls from Dovetail Workwear, I inquired about them immediately because other than the railroad striped overalls, white was what I wanted most. Finally, at least two years later, they were offered on Amazon in a size that was almost small enough for me: another $65 in alterations later and they are almost perfect. There is still a little excess material in the back but roomier is better than too tight. I still don't know why the smaller sizes aren't available. Is it because they aren't even offered in sizes smaller than size 2 or is it because the demand is so high that they sell out as soon as they are offered? I settled for size 2 short. This is probably as good as it's going to get for me.

I purchased one set for me, and one for a co-worker who always raved about them when I wore them.  She is much smaller than me (size 10). When she tried them on, they looked great, however they had a fitted style. I asked if she wanted to exchange them for a 12 and she felt that this style would not look good with a "baggy" look.  They are super cute.  For me, I bought a size up because I wanted the baggy look and honestly, I think they look fine sized up.  I'll add pics later.
What a difference it made to buy overalls specifically tailored for women! The fit is so comfortable. The fabric is stretchy but strong and durable. Love mine!

Strap clasp broke after 2 weeks of regular use.  Tried calling Dovetail customer service several times and left messages.  No response.  Would definitely NOT recommend Dovetail overalls.  Several other customers report the same problem in these reviews
Material is sturdy and fits really well. Suspender's have stretchy material for comfortable stretching.
Worth every dollar! Super comfortable, they fit every part of the body just right.. I’ve received many compliments. Definitely gonna buy in other colors

I purchased these for my wife after she stumbled across them and casually mentioned they looked great for her fit and purpose. They didn’t disappoint. My wife loves them- working outside, around the house, going out to run errands or drop by a friends house- she wears them all the time.
These are expensive overalls for breaking just a few years later. :/

These are absolutely the best pair of overalls ive ever worn! They beat carhartt by a mile!  They are so comfortable and everything on the pants are so carefully thought out. The bib pocket has a button & a zipper pouch, preventing things from falling out when you bend over. The suspenders are flexible so you dont feel restricted when you reach up. The clasps are so easy to connect & disconnect. The buttons on the side dont come unbuttoned when im working. The knees are super durable!!  I weld in these daily & will never buy carhartt or dickies again!
Great fit comfortable true to size

These are comfortable and have a lot of pockets. I wanted to wear them to my warehouse job but some of the seams were already fraying when I received them. I ended up returning them and would probably only buy them for a steep discount or lightly used.
These fit great! And they are so comfortable. I would definitely recommend buying these.

These are super cute and comfortable. It’s nice to find a good pair of overalls that fit my body shape. I usually shop in lens clothing but mens clothings fits weird and is bulky. Honestly I feel so comfortable in these and I feel like I can more around in comfort too. And I honestly love how it has pockets! Most womens wear has small pockets or even just a stitch as a pocket. Buy them!
Ordered the 27x32 (size 4) Dark Grey Canvas. Fits great. I'm about 5'9" and 120lbs and can comfortably wear a pair of leggings underneath. Good enough amount of stretch while still feeling durable.
Very durable fabric. Lots of pockets. Very well made. Worth the money. These will really last. I think they run a little big.

评论概述: horrible fit if you have a flat back then they will be perfect for you
类型: Size: 6 Extra LongColor: Saddle Brown Canvas
评论详情: fit someone with a flat ass with NO ASS horrible fit if you have a flat back then they will be perfect for you

类型: Size: 10 Extra LongColor: Heathered Black Denim
评论详情: I have to carry a lot in my pockets for work & do a lot of bending, lifting, climbing & work with power equipment daily. These are sooo comfortable! They look cute, but are more than functional as well. I want every color now! I wanted overalls that were fitted, but not strangling so I could move freely. I was very hesitant after seeing the price, but they are well worth the money. They are a little long (which is rare with my long legs I got the 34” length) but with my work shoes they work. There’s so many pockets & the pockets with snaps are perfect for my key to my locker at work.

评论概述: Very cute but you'll lose your buttons!
类型: Size: 4 Extra LongColor: Heathered Black Denim
评论详情: It's adorable but 1 - the clips don't stay on the buttons and 2 - the buttons popped off within a year. Good luck wearing them!

类型: Size: 6 Extra LongColor: Indigo Stripe Denim
评论详情: I’m 5’ 9” and these are long enough, rare find, very happy with these.  Nice tapered leg but wide enough to go over my boots. Fabulous fit,, super comfortable stretchy material, helpful pockets.  Suspenders have elastic which makes a comfortable fit and easy to move in.  Only thing I can think of that is not perfect, is the clips for the suspenders to attach to the bib are really hard to unlatch.  Other than that these are too wonderful to get dirty!  Love them!

At first, I loved these so much that I bought two pairs. Although after a few wears the straps come unbuckled ALL THE TIME. So I tightened the elastic straps and now the elastic is starting to become weak and stretched out. Probably making the buckles work even less.

I used to love wearing overalls when I was younger and slimmer… Now at 5’7, 210lbs in my late 40’s I haven’t wanted to don a pair after trying several on and feeling ‘frumpy’. I work in the construction industry and wanted something to aid me in what I do and decided to give these a try after reading several reviews. Following the sizing chart, they fit to a T and have the perfect stretch to maneuver better than any other work pant. I like how they look aesthetically to the point that I wear them outside of work too! Made in the US, by women for women??? Yes please! I am so impressed by this little company and their products! Keep it up ladies!! <3

I ordered 31x34 in the grey and they came labeled 6x34. So they are very fitted. I would not have thought a 31 was equivalent to size 6. I ordered 31 hoping they would be a little loose. Great quality I would order again but I would definitely size up.

I renovate houses for a living and needed a pair of overalls that would accommodate knee pad inserts--trust me ladies, once you've worked with pants with that feature, you'll never want to go back! These fit the bill and fit nicely too. I like that there are different lengths to choose from so they go down over the tops of my shoes. (My other brand looked like highwaters.) I wish the straps could be tightened more. (I'm 5'6" so reaaly don't think they should be too long in the torso, but they are.) They have an elastic bit at the back that doesn't allow the shoulder straps to be tightened all the way. I may need to have them altered. The only thing missing from these is a hammer loop. I mean, there are tons of pockets, but WHY not a hammer loop?! Overall would recommend.

Finally real overalls, With real kneepad slots, pockets and flexible material…  I’ve been looking for good overalls to wear while gardening and in the woodshop for years…. I’m So Happy to finally have these.

After several washings the strap clasp keeps breaking. I repaired it twice and it still keeps falling apart. Unfortunately, this happened after the return window closed. I love the fit of the overalls but the strap keeps breaking open.

评论概述: Great overalls!  I wear them way too often!
评论详情: They fit perfectly, are flattering for overalls and have just enough stretch to be comfortable too

The SIZING on here could be so much simpler. The SIZING on this exact site used to be size 8,9,10,11,12,14, and so on. They have now changed it to (example) 34x32 , 36x34,,, ect....It's beyond confusing. So 35Wx32L IS A SIZE (14). SO IF YOU WANT A SIZE 14 YOU NEED TO ORDER (35Wx32L).  I absolutely love these overalls, this is my second pair! They're nice and long for me too. (I can't stand Highwater pants. I am 5'7, and about 175-180. I wear them with long rubber boots, and the pant legs fit over them perfectly!. The fabric is nice and thick/ sturdy. They're not baggy on me, so if you're a size 14, and you want them baggy order a size up. I work in them outside! And the other pair I wear out and about, I get many compliments on my blue striped ones! I will be buying one in every color!

评论概述: Finally, a pair of overalls for taller women
类型: Size: 16 Extra LongColor: Indigo Stripe Denim
评论详情: Very happy with the fit and the fabric so far, finally a women's cut overall with a longer inseam! Wish there were more colors to choose from, but got the striped and heavier canvas pairs, both fit well. I'm 6,1" and wear a 34-35 in inseam, bought size 14, fit with room to spare and able to move and bend comfortably. Good, deep pockets for tools and phones.only worn a few times so far, but would purchase again.
looks good and very practical

It is rare that I take a piece of clothing out of the box and it fits like second skin, stretchy in all the right places and very flattering. And tough! Can't wait to buy another pair. You rock, Dovetail!

评论概述: Fun but think I got the wrong size
评论详情: I like the overall design and look but the fit isn’t working. The inseam isn’t right for me. I have to tighten the straps to get it to feel comfortable but then the length is to short. So I’m either dealing with the crouch rubbing. Or I’m waiting for a flood.  It might be to stretchy.
Thank you ladies for creating the perfect work wear for women. I team lead a community garden. So far these are best ever!! I have purchase 2 more pair! You thought of everything! Love the pockets !
Awesome for yardwork

My new favorite overalls !!! (had another pair not this brand just a generic brand and they didn’t hold up very long the crotch wore out and got holes in it and I couldn’t squat down very easily )… but these are the best overalls of ever owned in my life super comfortable I love the material !Love these! got them for work… my husband and I own an exterminating business. And I can squat down in them no problem they’re stretchy and I love the extra room in the crotch area . not restricting at all it’s great! They are cute and stretchy enough for tight crawlspaces ! I love them I will be getting another pair

Sizing is different than ordering from the website. I have several pairs that I ordered from Dovetail.com and I always wear an 8/32. I received a 10/32 from Amazon and although they fit the same they did not fit in the straps. The straps are very very long and even after shortening them to the max amount they still did not fit right. Not sure what's going on. Maybe they are defectives that they can't sell on their site. Not sure. Order with caution.
I absolutely love these. They are worth the expense. They are well made and comfortable. I am so glad I bought them. Great for hard labor.

The 28/32 is the same as 2/32 which is my size. The "White" is really Ivory. They have all the great features of the Freshley overall. One thing. The "made in" tag is not to be found at least on the pair that I received. I am very happy with these.

Just order from Dovetail direct. You will likely get sent the wrong size from Amazon due to the size conversion chart. I saw this complaint throughout the reviews and against instinct ordered anyways. I ordered according to the chart and was sent the incorrect size. I'm 5'7"-5'8" and about 160lbs. I ordered 33/34 (size 10, tall 34 inseam so that I could cuff the bottoms) and received size 12/34. The size 12 overalls I got were too big, but they still looked alright so I'm guessing the correct size will look great! I might even get the 32 inseam because even though I have longer legs, the 34 is extra long. The overalls felt comfy but durable (except for the elastic straps which do feel as though they will stretch out fast!)

评论概述: Love these - sizes are not uniform over styles
类型: Size: 4 Extra LongColor: Indigo Stripe Denim
评论详情: I really love these overalls, I’m getting 2 pairs and would get more if they had other colors I like. However my challenge, with buying any clothes online, is that they don’t always have the right sizes and even when you think you measured correctly they still might not fit. I’ve gone through 3 pairs before finding the right fit. Then, excited that I got one that fit I ordered a different style in the same size, the denim stripped one. It was WAY bigger than the orange ones in the same size, sadly I had to return another pair and try again to find the right size. Otherwise these are super comfortable, and actually look good on me and my butt :) and I love all the pockets. One only other complaint though is that the pockets aren’t uniform across the colors either. That nifty scissors pocket, only on the denim stripped ones, not orange. Oh well, I still love the overalls.
Loved it!

评论概述: AMAZING feel and design. Pricy, but totally worth splurging!
评论详情: I did not want to spend this much on a pair of overalls, but so glad I did. They were worth every penny. The material is high quality! You have the flexibility necessary for doing challenging physical and dirty tasks -whether outside or in a shop! You also have the protection! Best part for a woman... they're flattering and have ALL the pockets! Sizing is tricky. If in between sizes, go up one. I read countless reviews to try and pick my correct size to avoid a return. I'm 5'4" and 130lbs and I went with a size 4, 30 inseam. They fit beautifully and held up for the crazy jobs I had to tackle. Because of the stretch factor, they did loosen up but that will be great for layering! Even though they aren't insulated, they're surprisingly warm! I'm writing all the things I seeked in reviews to help you decide to buy and try! Price was my first main concern, but when you have the support necessary to get the job done comfortably and efficiently, the price no longer matters.

I work at a nursery so bending over, getting wet and avoiding thorns is a regular practice. A customer saw me wearing a pair of Levi's overalls and she couldn't recommend enough the pair of Dovetail overalls she was wearing. I was so excited to finally find a good recommendation--they fit a female body, move with you, are thick without being heavy or cumbersome, and a good cold wind doesn't go through them, and neither do thorns! The elastic in the straps really makes a difference for comfort and ease, and I dread the day that the elastic wears out -- but the customer had worn hers for years, so here's hoping that they last forever! I'm so glad I finally found a brand of overalls worth the investment. I ordered my exact size and it's comfortable, enough room to wear leggings underneath.
I bought them as a gift for my wife, she loves the fit, and that the are made for women, now she does not have to ware mine for projects around the house.

I’d had my eye on these but couldn’t justify spending so much on a pair of overalls. But, I finally decided to treat myself and I’m very glad I did. These fit better than any other overalls I have and I love the selection of pockets. The fabric is sturdy but not stiff- it has a good amount of stretchiness. I have interstitial cystitis, so having clothing I can wear which doesn’t put pressure on my bladder is important. These overalls allow me to be comfortable, while looking a bit more put-together than sweatpants do. I’m probably going to be ordering a pair in another color soon!
I love the product because is discribed properly,  I work in construction  and for us perfect
Great work gear for gardeners
These overalls get complimented everywhere I go; I can work hard and not look like a man! Only thing I'd change, is they need real cargo pockets.
For those trying to figure out the sizing compared to the Dovetail size chart: 31=6, 32=8, 33=10…  If you want a looser fit recommend sizing up 1 or 2 sizes.

So I ordered these based on the sizes listed for the order 29wx32l but they were sent in a size 4 which from what I have double checked online would be a size 27. Not sure why they offer different types of sizing if they will be sent in standard 2,4, 6, etc. Maybe would have helped me in ordering the size or maybe the wrong size was sent to me? I can tell they are wonderful though the material seems really sturdy and the leg opening is perfect . Wish these had fit. I'm going to reorder and see if I can get the right size.

I first ordered an 8 (by mistake. the sizing to order on Amazon is goofy, 26, 28, 30 what is a Size 10?) Then when they arrived they say Size 8x34???? I could actually get into the size 8 on but they were pretty tight. I returned and I decided to go with a 12 and I think the fit is perfect for me -just a little loose. I love that these are in long lengths like 34. I then preceded to try to order more colors but my size is mostly out of stock...please please get more in! Love these.

I love these overalls! They are so comfortable with just enough stretch to bend, squat, and work. I am 5'7" and an athletic-ish 145 lbs. I bought the 29Wx34L (I have more leg than torso). They fit perfectly for what I need them for. I would have to size up to layer underneath, but I wanted something I could wear through the summer that still allowed me to look like women. I love that these show off my natural curve while still being tough enough to get to work on the farm. I might need another pair! Worth every penny!

I love these overalls! They are EXACTLY what I needed for outside working. Gardening and odd projects around the yard. They fit perfect. They do not ride up. The strap adjustments do not move around. They stay put! They have plenty of very useful pockets. Easy to get on and off. I wear them over my leggings on cold mornings. I love them. I would definitely buy them again. Totally worth it!!
Very comfortable will be great to work in and looks good too I'm 5'4 118 pounds and I ordered a small and 32 inch's long it is prefect length and tightness love these.

评论概述: Fit great but don't have my size anymore
评论详情: I'm 5'3" 135-140lbs I ordered a size 4x30L and they fit perfectly.  I would order another pair if they ever get my size in another color.
